hymn.title: Dear Savior, Thou art mine
hymn.category: Assurance and Joy of Salvation—Saved by Grace

layout.singingstanza: Dear Sav -- ior, Thou art mine, How sweet the thought to me; Let me re -- peat Thy name, And lift my heart to Thee. Mine! Mine! Mine! I know Thou art mine; Sav -- ior, dear Sav -- ior, I know Thou art mine.

lyrics.stanza: Dear Savior, Thou art mine, How sweet the thought to me; Let me repeat Thy name, And lift my heart to Thee.
Mine! Mine! Mine! I know Thou art mine; Savior, dear Savior, I know Thou art mine.
Thou art the sinner's friend, So I Thy friendship claim, A sinner saved by grace, When Thy sweet message came.
So let me sing Thy praise, So let me call Thee mine. I cannot doubt Thy word, I know that I am Thine.
